lines.text: I can't alter my feelings to suit your lifestyle.
Why not? You want me to alter my lifestyle to suit your feelings.
Only if they're your feelings too.

[Allie and Jennie are concluding a talk about sex]
What you're saying is that I should wait.
But that the choice is mine.

[after joke has been successfully pulled]
And people say I'm not the fun one.

Let me tell you something about your father, Emma. He may not always be there for you like some fathers are. But when he is, it's parades and skyrockets. Cherish every moment because he's one of a kind and he loves you so much.
